articles.content: In light of the COVID-19 pandemic, the companies are also looking into ways to detect biological hazards like contagious viruses. Koniku has touted security as well as medical applications, with sniffers that can detect signs of cancer — in much the same way … [+644 chars]

articles.title: Apple Watch ECG detects heart condition in German woman - AppleInsider
articles.description: The ECG function of the Apple Watch has been credited with uncovering a heart condition in an 80-year-old woman in Germany, one that was seemingly missed by a hospital's own ECG during a diagnosis.

articles.title: ILOVEYOU Virus: 20 Years After the Malware Caused $10B Losses Worldwide - Tech Times
articles.description: On May 4 will be the 20th anniversary of one of the most destructive viruses in history.
articles.content:
At the start of the millennium, a different virus has once baffled the world. With just an email, the I Love You virus has spread immediately, crashing computers, deleting files, and causing about $10 billion of damage in a glance.
On May 4, 2000, people wor… [+3650 chars]
